title: Cookies are used but do not collect personal information or track usage.

tosdr.tldr: Our websites tutanota.com and tutanota.de use so-called cookies, which are stored on your computer in order to make your visit to our website more attractive and to allow the use of certain functions. „Cookies“ are small text files that can be stored by a website locally in the memory of your Internet browser on the computer you are using. The cookies on our sites do not collect personal information about you or your use. You can delete cookies by clicking on the appropriate menu item in your internet browser or by deleting them on your hard drive. For details, refer to the help menu of your browser.
